description: British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality

ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
Salt and black pepper to taste
cooking_method: Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add shrimp to the skillet and season with salt and black pepper. Cook until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.
Add cooked linguine to the skillet and toss to combine with shrimp and garlic oil.
Stir in chopped parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve hot and enjoy!
